pullRequest.title: xp-tracker: Add Time-To-Level to Canvas And XP Tracker
pullRequest.bodyText:
closes #10888
closes #8373
This PR makes the XP tracker panel (and Overlay Canvas) labels configurable for different metrics.
TTL in Progress bar:

Customizable XpInfoBox

Config menu

beforeCommit.message: xp-tracker: fix xp/hr config label & progress bar label names

afterCommit.message: xp-tracker: fix xp/hr config label & progress bar label names

@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@

+ * (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
+ * LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND
+ * ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT
+ * (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
+ * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
+ */
+package net.runelite.client.plugins.xptracker;
+
+import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
+import lombok.Getter;
+
+import java.util.function.Function;
+
+import static net.runelite.client.plugins.xptracker.XpInfoBox.TWO_DECIMAL_FORMAT;
+
+@Getter
+@AllArgsConstructor
+public enum XpProgressBarLabel
+{
+	PERCENTAGE((snap) -> TWO_DECIMAL_FORMAT.format(snap.getSkillProgressToGoal()) + "%"),
+	TIME_TO_LEVEL(XpSnapshotSingle::getTimeTillGoal),
+
+	;

nodes.bodyText: Can't you simply use getTimeToLevel? It already contains formatted string
I don't think we need to do this. Imo #8373 can be closed with previous commits (as there will be possibility to display TTL, i don't think it needs to be on progress bar as long as its somewhere)

commit.message:
xp-tracker: add configurable labels to XpInfoBox

This commit allows users to change the XpInfoBox to which ever xp stat is available in the config menu. This also adds TTL in the form of hh:mm:ss to the info box
xp-tracker: add more configurable labels to canvas overlay
xp-tracker: add option to show ttl or percentage til goal

beforeCommit.message: xp-tracker: add option to show ttl or percentage til goal #8373

afterCommit.message: xp-tracker: add option to show ttl or percentage til goal
